messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fllight Tracking
messages.msgSnippet: Ann You might be able to do this throught the airline website.  My DH is a locamotive engineer with Amtrak and I can find info. sometimes this way.  Also DS1
messages.messageBody:
Ann
You might be able to do this throught the airline
website. My DH is a locamotive engineer with Amtrak
and I can find info. sometimes this way. Also DS1 is
a truck driver and I can find him via satelilte via
the truck co. to which the truck is contracted.

But a telephone call to the airline is probably the
easiest.
Sharon

--- Ann <mumsienc@...> wrote:
> Hi all...
> I have a sister traveling today across country to
> visit us.
> Does anyone know where I can track flights?
> Thanks,
> Ann
>
>
>
